title: How has Elvis Presley impacted your life, if at all? - Quora

response.answer_text: Thank you for the A2A Elvis Presley impacted my life in many ways. When I was 5 I heard Elvis for the first time. I knew I wanted to be a musician but I didn’t know how to play any instrument. When I was 7 I heard AC/DC and I knew I wanted to play guitar. If it weren’t for Elvis I probably wouldn’t be a musician today. I’ve played with many of my musical heroes. Released 5 albums so far. Have toured all over and done a lot of things most people only dream about. I credit Elvis Presley for that. Here I am onstage playing with AC/DC bassist Cliff Williams

Elvis Presley was very popular when I was a child and a teenager. As a matter of fact, I went on a blind date with a man and he took me to an Elvis concert in Denver. It was a very interesting night. Unfortunately, Elvis died three years later. Also, I lived in Memphis as a child, but I never got to meet Elvis.
